phases.title: UI Mapping Command
tasks: Implement copilot-automator.mapUITextArea command to allow users to select and map input/output areas. (done)
Store mappings (URI, type, description) in globalState for persistence. (done)
Prompt user for classification and optional description. (done)

phases.title: Automation Integration
tasks: Update automation logic to use mapped input/output areas for sending prompts and reading responses. (done)
Modify getLastCopilotChatResponse and sendPromptToChat to leverage mappings. (done)
Log mapping and automation actions for traceability. (done)

phases.title: UI/UX Enhancements
tasks: Add a webview button and history tree item to trigger the mapping command. (done)
Provide user feedback and error handling for mapping actions. (done)
Validate mapped areas and warn if inaccessible or stale. (done)

phases.title: Mapping Management & Settings
tasks: Implement a settings or management panel to view, edit, or remove mappings. (done)
Allow users to update or remap areas as needed. (done)
Support exporting/importing mappings for workflow reproducibility. (done)

phases.title: Advanced Automation & Fallbacks
tasks: Integrate mappings with instruction files for automated workflows.
Add fallback logic if mapped areas are unavailable.
Explore auto-detection of likely input/output areas based on URI patterns.

notes: Each phase can be developed and tested independently.
User feedback should be gathered after each phase for iterative improvement.
Documentation and usage examples should be updated as features are added.
